languages.text: "Нам жаль, что пришлось так поступить. Но он был угрозой. Не только нам — жизням Коронуса. Тому, что мы хотим хранить и оберегать.
"We regret that we had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives in the Koronus Expanse as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."
languages.original_text: "Нам жаль, что пришлось так поступить. Но он был угрозой. Не только нам — жизням Коронуса. Тому, что мы хотим хранить и оберегать.

traits.locale_text: "We are so sorry that we had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives on Koronus as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."
"We are so sorry that we had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives on Koronus as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."
"We are so sorry to have had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives on Koronus as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."
"We are so sorry to have had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives on Koronus as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."
"We regret that we had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives in the Koronus Expanse as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."
"We regret that we had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives in the Koronus Expanse as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."

languages.text: « Nous regrettons d'avoir dû faire cela, mais il représentait une menace, pour nous et pour toutes les vies des Étendues de Koronus. Des vies que nous voulons chérir et protéger. »
languages.original_text: "We regret that we had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives in the Koronus Expanse as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."

traits.locale_text: « Nous regrettons terriblement d'avoir dû faire cela, mais il représentait une menace, pour nous et pour toutes les vies de Koronus. Des vies que nous voulons chérir et protéger. »

languages.text: «Lamentamos haber tenido que hacer esto, pero era una amenaza no solo para nosotros, sino para todas las vidas de la Extensión de Koronus. Algo que queremos cuidar y proteger».
languages.original_text: "We regret that we had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives in the Koronus Expanse as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."

traits.locale_text: «Lamentamos terriblemente haber tenido que hacer esto, pero era una amenaza no solo para nosotros, sino para todas las vidas de Koronus. Algo que queremos cuidar y proteger».

languages.text: “我们真的很抱歉，但我们不得不这么做。他构成了威胁，不仅仅是对我们，还对整个科罗努斯扩区的生命构成了威胁。我们在乎那些生命，我们想保护他们。”
languages.original_text: "We regret that we had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives in the Koronus Expanse as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."

traits.locale_text: “我们很抱歉，但我们不得不这么做。他构成了威胁，不仅仅是对我们，还对整个科罗努斯扩区的生命构成了威胁。我们在乎那些生命，我们想保护他们。”

languages.text: "Wir bedauern, dass wir das tun mussten. Doch er hat eine Gefahr dargestellt, und zwar nicht nur für uns, sondern auch für all die Leben in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Etwas, was wir lieben und schützen wollen."
languages.original_text: "We regret that we had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives in the Koronus Expanse as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."

traits.locale_text: "Es tut uns so leid, dass wir das tun mussten. Doch er hat eine Gefahr dargestellt, und zwar nicht nur für uns, sondern für all die Leben auf Koronus. Etwas, was wir lieben und schützen wollen."

languages.text: 「このようなことをする羽目になったのは、実に残念だ。だが、彼は我々だけでなく、コロヌス・エクスパンスのすべての命に対して…我々が護りたいものに対しても脅威をもたらしたのだ」
languages.original_text: "We regret that we had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives in the Koronus Expanse as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."

traits.locale_text: 「このようなことをする羽目になったのは、実に残念だ。だが、彼は我々だけでなく、コロヌス・エクスパンスのすべての命に対して…我々が護りたいものに対しても脅威をもたらしたのだ」

languages.text: "Bunu yapmak zorunda kaldığımız için pişmanız. Fakat sadece bizim için değil, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki herkes için bir tehlike oluşturuyordu. Koronus Enginliği'ni yüceltmek ve korumak istiyoruz."
languages.original_text: "We regret that we had to do this. But he posed a threat, and not just to us, but to all the lives in the Koronus Expanse as well. Something that we want to cherish and protect."
